alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gulf and western Franklin Counties through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Nine Mile, Buck Siding, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Tilton, Beverly, White City, Bay City, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Dalkeith and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
